It‚Äôs steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. ‚ÄúYou were careless,‚Äù she says. ‚ÄúYou are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.‚Äù---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions and a mistake he keeps repeating. entry.title: Delayed Onset

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,733Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 96

Summary: Stiles barked out a weak laugh and got a mouthful of pool water for his trouble. He spit it out. Kept swimming. ‚ÄúYou? Mellow?‚Äù ‚ÄúI‚Äôm mellow.‚Äù Derek groused and the teen snorted, his eyes scrunching closed with his incredulous smile. ‚ÄúNot the word I‚Äôd use. Pissy. That‚Äôs the word I‚Äôd-‚Äù Derek spit water at his face and Stiles jerked his his head away and spluttered another laugh. The sudden spasm of movement made him wince, though, and gasp in pain. His eyes fluttered closed again and for a few minutes he just breathed through his teeth. He didn't know how much longer he could keep them afloat like this. ---- ‚ÄúMissing scenes" expansion on the S2x04 ‚ÄúAbomination‚Äù episode. SO MUCH BANTER. Mild angst & h/c

entry.title: A Stiles Styled Emergency
entry.summary:
Author: anarchycox

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,347Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 160

Summary: There is nothing in the world worse than been assigned to Beacon Hills for your training hours as an EMT. It might as well be a nexus portal, or hell mouth. The only thing that made it was worse that the worst classmate in the world, know it all Stilinski was also assigned there. Now he was stuck dealing with werewolves, maybe the end times, and worst of all Stiles. An outsider pov of Beacon Hills and what it would be like to be a co-worker of Stiles Stilinski
